title: New: Carly Foxx x Johan Ilves – Burns Like
body:
Getting some real late night Burial vibes from Londonder **Carly Foxx** on her newest track, Burns Like, teaming up with frequent collaborator Johan Ilves.

An intimate composition, utilising Foxx’s elegant vocal in a restrained and poignant manner, it’s perfect for those 3am comedowns. Check it out below.

Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
